wikipedia_page.main: Carlo Gordon Monti (born 10 July 1990) is a Scottish professional footballer, who plays for Kilwinning Rangers in the West of Scotland League. He has previously played at Scottish Championship level for Greenock Morton and Dundee.

response: Carlo Monti (24 March 1920 – 7 April 2016) was an Italian athlete who competed mainly in the 100 metres. He won two medals, one individual and one relay, in international athletics competitions.
Carlo Monti has won 8 times the individual national championship.
